Producer: Lilian Eche, Michael Eckelt, Christel Henon, Johannes Jancke
Screenwriter: Guillaume Giovanetti, Cagla Zencirci, Ramata Sy
Synopsis: Rejected by her fellow villagers, a mute woman relentlessly hunts down a wolf that is said to be prowling in the neighboring forest, sparking off fears and fantasies among the village women.
Title: Sibel
